channel.title: Community - Reaching for Help
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I used to run many servers that maybe got about 50-70 players and I really miss it...and I've seen how beaten up some servers have gotten and I miss just hanging out with a community, and I'd like to run a server..but I don't know where to start. I don't see many people interested in RSPSs anymore and I can understand why, but I'd like to get back into it. So I am reaching out to everyone to see if we can get together and just get a player base and some decent staff members to kick up a server.
I also want to say something. This server, I don't want it to run off donations, but run off my love for the community. So any price for servers I will provide out of my OWN pockets. I have been saving up for quite a while just to make this announcement, and I guess it could go bad an we get nobody to join or it could go good and we have tons of people to join. So basically: this server won't be begging you for money ;) which I know a lot of you like that. We may bring up donations in the future but I won't allow the ability to make this a PAY to PLAY game. I don't like that.
So please...if you are interested just post on here, and let me know I'll check back daily and once I feel like we have enough support I will get the server rolling. I have not worked on much development yet, but I do have a base, and I want to save the trouble of asking you guys - What kind of features/server would you guys like?
One last thing: I want this server to be a community, not a staff-tyrant-game. I know we'll need staff but I wanna look for the best who will do their job. So if you do wish to be staff I recommend just being apart of the discussion until the server is up and I'll message you when you join.
It'd mean a lot to me if we could get some positive feedback, and I'd be happy to see if we can get a lot of support. This game will be entirely community run, all ideas will be through you. If we do get this server running, I vow to not go to sleep until I read every idea you guys have and respond to them ;)
Thank you all ~ XA (Matt)

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:9, topic:552242”][quote author=my-swagger link=topic=671158.msg4488551#msg4488551 date=1435869486]
I doubt you’ve ever had the pleasure of a full wage before.

What do you put on your CV? “Part time RSPS coder”? rune-server as your reference?
[/quote]

okay “my-swagger” im 17 years old, while other scrubs my age are working at fast food restaurants I’m “working” 2-4 days and making around $300-600 USD per week (depending on how much work I feel like doing, some server managers will also give big “payouts” every once in awhile). you look really dumb because no one was talking about CVs or references, all I was trying to state in my original comment was that I make more money with RSPS than I did when I had a part-time job… that’s all. pretty sure you’re just salty because you’re broke

What on earth were you making at you workplace that you think RSPS can pay the bills?

once again I’m 17 and no one was talking about “paying the bills” man… did you even read my original post or are you just trying to be condescending?[/quote]

Let hope you didn’t earn over $6,200 for the year.

http://www.irs.gov/publications/p929/ar02.html

Read full topic

item.title: Community - Reaching for Help
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:11, topic:552242”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=671158.msg4488637#msg4488637 date=1435924075]

Spend your money on something else. Dead market.

Dead market…? I literally don’t even have to work part-time because I make twice as much here lmao

What on earth were you making at you workplace that you think RSPS can pay the bills?

where did you read anyone say that it can pay bills?

there’s plenty money to be made through RSPS if that’s what you choose to use it for. I seriously doubt anyone is trying to pay bills/feed their family with income generated from rsps

That is incorrect. I’m sure people at Ikov are making a substantial amount that they can pay the bills. Unless lare was an employee at Ikov I seriously doubt he would be making any sort of money around that ballpark. The way he said “part time” would make me believe that he was providing for himself. I know many people who are 17 that who are now living by themselves (or with room mates). So for him to state that he was making more money from a part time job, it isn’t surprising for me to believe that they are using this money to pay the bills.
[/quote]

Idk what you’re trying to prove to me. I said “I seriously doubt anyone is trying to pay bills/feed their family with income generated from rsps”. Obviously people at ikov make a boat load, but there’s only a few servers that actually make that amount of money. I never said it was impossible to support your fam with that money. Anyone who relies on something illegal(such as an rsps) as a way of income for their family is a retard.

I’m not even sure what you’re arguing tbh. Everything you’ve said is flawed, because once again, you’re the one who brought up paying bills, lol.[/quote]

I’m not arguing over anything. I am just backing up my original statement that it isn’t so uncommon to see a 17 year old living by themselves paying their bills etc. Nothing i’ve said is flawed.

Read full topic

item.title: Community - Reaching for Help
item.dc:creator: @EcoPS_GM EcoPS GM
item.description:
@EcoPS_GM wrote:

Where to start? Well, you’re on the designated sites for that, friend! You can easily make advertisements hereon Mopar, R-S, and RL. Once you’ve gotten that done, simply apply to some toplists and get your server noticed publicly throughout every available eyes possible.

It’s great to see someone starting a project based off passion as opposed to currency. It seems as though others would prefer that, of course - easily understandable. However, the majority of ‘server owners’ are only there to receive payments. Honestly, most of ‘server owners’ aren’t even attempting to learn legitimate functionality of the given language. It’s sad to see, but it is what it is.

Good luck with your server, Matt.

Read full topic

item.title: Community - Reaching for Help
item.dc:creator: @Xa1 Xa
item.description:
@Xa1 wrote:

Hey Guys,

I used to run many servers that maybe got about 50-70 players and I really miss it…and I’ve seen how beaten up some servers have gotten and I miss just hanging out with a community, and I’d like to run a server…but I don’t know where to start. I don’t see many people interested in RSPSs anymore and I can understand why, but I’d like to get back into it. So I am reaching out to everyone to see if we can get together and just get a player base and some decent staff members to kick up a server.

I also want to say something. This server, I don’t want it to run off donations, but run off my love for the community. So any price for servers I will provide out of my OWN pockets. I have been saving up for quite a while just to make this announcement, and I guess it could go bad an we get nobody to join or it could go good and we have tons of people to join. So basically: this server won’t be begging you for money which I know a lot of you like that. We may bring up donations in the future but I won’t allow the ability to make this a PAY to PLAY game. I don’t like that.

So please…if you are interested just post on here, and let me know I’ll check back daily and once I feel like we have enough support I will get the server rolling. I have not worked on much development yet, but I do have a base, and I want to save the trouble of asking you guys - What kind of features/server would you guys like?

One last thing: I want this server to be a community, not a staff-tyrant-game. I know we’ll need staff but I wanna look for the best who will do their job. So if you do wish to be staff I recommend just being apart of the discussion until the server is up and I’ll message you when you join.

It’d mean a lot to me if we could get some positive feedback, and I’d be happy to see if we can get a lot of support. This game will be entirely community run, all ideas will be through you. If we do get this server running, I vow to not go to sleep until I read every idea you guys have and respond to them

Thank you all ~ XA (Matt)

Read full topic
